t: Amazon.com: LunchBots Duo Stainless Steel Food Container, Orange : Home & Kitchen
s: Maybe we're lucky and got one of ... Lunchbots duo, pico, and uno products for my kids' lunches and love them. Having used them for two preschool boys for an entire school year, I can now say confidently that I love these products and will be ordering more. They're very sturdy and while they're not leakproof (which knocks them down to 4 instead of 5 stars in my book), the product clearly STATES that it's not a leakproof product. So I purchased another brand of containers ...
